text: When the Disk_Deprecated forwarding agent is set to use MultiForwardingUDR input, it accepts input of the UDR type MultiForwardingUDR declared in the package FNT. The declaration follows: internal MultiForwardingUDR { // Entire file content byte[] content; // Target filename and directory FNTUDR fntSpecification; }; The content of the MultiForwardingUDR will be stored at the path that you have set in the fntSpecification field. Use the APL functions fntAddString and fntAddDirDelimiter to set the value of this field. For further information about these functions, see FNTUDR Functions in the APL Reference Guide .
title: Real-Time Disk_Deprecated Forwarding Agent MultiForwardingUDR Input - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
